testCase.name: timeConverter returns hours, minutes and seconds on valid input
timeConverter returns null on invalid input
calculateGrade returns A+ and you pass for any grade >= 97 on valid input
calculateGrade returns A and you pass for any grade >= 93 <= 96 on valid input
calculateGrade returns A- and you pass for any grade >= 90 <= 92 on valid input
calculateGrade returns null on invalid input
getLetter returns a letter based on valid input
getLetter returns null on invalid input
calculateScore returns score on valid input
calculateScore returns null on invalid input
